featured.text: In the dream the cloakroom attendant at a theater stopped me in the lobby and insisted on my ___(31)___

definition.zh_def: 大廳；遊說（某人）以影響其決策或行為。
definition.en_def: A large entrance or reception area; to attempt to influence decisions made by officials in government or other organizations.
definition.example: The group gathered in the lobby to discuss their plans before the meeting.
